body:
Quick question what types of links are ok to use in chat without getting banned for advertizing?
Is ok for me to put the link to a YouTube video in chat as long a it's Avicus?
What about the link for optifine? or other links to help someone?
body_tagged:

title: Links In Chat

replies.body: I think you can advertise your Youtube videos if it's Avicus only. I wouldn't recommend advertising websites and such.
replies.body_tagged: I think you can advertise your Youtube videos if it's Avicus only. I wouldn't recommend advertising websites and such.

replies.body: Ok I was wondering because I know you can post forums topics and the link for club dj.
replies.body_tagged: Ok I was wondering because I know you can post forums topics and the link for club dj.
